REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f2864 reute d f BC-ACCELERATION-<ACLE>-C 03-31 0095

TEXT.TITLE: ACCELERATION <ACLE> CUTS STAKE IN UNITED COASTS
TEXT.BODY: Acceleration Corp said it sold a 24.9 pct stake in the common stock of <United Coasts Corp> to the <Sheet Metal Workers' National Pension Fund>. The company said it agreed to sell the fund an additional 5.1 pct of Hartford, Conn.-based United when the fund receives approval from the director of insurance of the state of Arizona. The company said today's sale reduced its holdings in United to 25 pct. The second sale, when completed, will lower its stake to 19.9 pct, Acceleration said. The company said the proceeds from both sales will be roughly equal to the 3,330,000 dlrs it originally invested in United Coasts in late 1985 even though it will retain a 19.9 pct stake. Acceleration said it plans to include gains from the stock sales in its results for the first and second quarters of 1987. Reuter
